titles.title: A bill for the relief of Thomas Nelson Flanagan.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.
Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice. Approved for full committee consideration without amendment favorably.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden with amendments. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1073.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 11/18/1987--Introduced. Confers jurisdiction upon the United States Claims Court to hear, determine, and render judgment on the claim of a named individual against the United States arising out of his wrongful discharge from the U.S. Naval Reserve.
